DOC.brief_title: Study Osteopathic Manipulative Medicine Autonomic Nervous System
DOC.detailed_description: This study intend examine three different OMM technique , sub-occipital release , rib-raising , stellate ganglion release , impact autonomic nervous system tone . Subjects randomly assign one four cohort group , receive either sub-occipital release , rib-raising , stellate ganglion release three treatment technique . A shift towards sympathetic tone induce subject use tilted-to-seated-position test ( Tilt-Seated Position test ) cognitive challenge test , consist computerized question become progressively difficult , subject ask answer quickly accurately possible . These stress test induce twice , without OMM treatment second time designate OMM treatment ( ) . The sympathetic-dependent response orthostatic change cognitive challenge determine Fourier analysis heart rate variability , record use EKG attach subject .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Individual capable give consent age 2050 Normal blood pressure define Seventh Report US National Committee Prevention , Detection , Education Treatment High Blood Pressure Normal EKG Normal Heart Rate Chronic Cardiovascular Disease ( include limit : congestive heart failure , previous myocardial infarction , cardiomyopathy , arrhythmia , previous cardiac surgery ) Hypertension define Seventh Report US National Committee Prevention , Detection , Education Treatment High Blood Pressure hypertensive medication Smoking Asthma Pregnancy Diabetes Current recent illness ( within past 7 day ) Any manipulative therapy within previous 7 day ( include limit : osteopathic manipulative treatment , massage acupuncture ) Well condition athlete ( long distance runner ) Anyone fails increase heart rate passive tilt test ( 50 degree headup )
